C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

containers.name: createbucket
args: /usr/bin/mc config host add plane-minio http://release-name-plane-so-minio:9000 $AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID $AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY && /usr/bin/mc mb plane-minio/$AWS_S3_BUCKET_NAME && /usr/bin/mc anonymous set download plane-minio/$AWS_S3_BUCKET_NAME;
